faq.question: Which platforms are supported?
faq.answer: YouTube is primary, with support for most major video platforms including Vimeo, Dailymotion, and social media sites.

faq.question: What video qualities are available?
faq.answer: Supports all available qualities from 144p to 4K, depending on what the source video offers.

faq.question: Can I download entire playlists?
faq.answer: Yes, paste a playlist URL to download all videos. You can also specify a range or select specific videos.

faq.question: Is this legal to use?
faq.answer: Legal for personal use, educational purposes, and content you own. Always respect copyright and platform terms.

faq.question: What formats are supported?
faq.answer: MP4 for video, MP3 for audio, plus WebM and other formats. Audio extraction saves as high-quality MP3.

faq.question: Where are videos saved?
faq.answer: Default location is your Downloads folder. You can specify a different path in your download request.
